original_title: Sri Lanka’s state-run Litro slashes cooking gas price citing drop in global market
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT: Sri Lanka’s state-run Litro Gas has decided to reduce prices of cooking gas by
approximately 1000 rupees with effect from Tuesday midnight (04) in line with the reduction in global LP

The price revision will be done inline with the newly introduced pricing formula based on global prices, he said, adding that the latest decision is the steepest price adjustments in the firm’s history.
The appreciation of the rupee currency also has helped the price reduction, he said.
The rupee has risen around 15 percent against the US dollar since the last week of February. (Colombo/April03/2023)
